https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mtsEIUkM6qUS0gPfPiznd3s8pjq.jpg Single mother Grace loves Christmas but her new partner John just can't abide the occasion. As the festive season approaches, it begins to drive the two of them apart so Grace decides to get to the bottom of his disaffection. Anything but Christmas
